author: anonymous
content:
The PHP download unfortunately gets parsed thus we can get the output, but not the download. You'll have to change the extension ot pack it into a TAR/ZIP file if you want people to download it.

Thanks a lot!

author: pdp
content: That's the purpose of it. You can use it straight from here... no need to download.

author: Franck
content: Doesnt work here. Not in IE neither FF. I am seeing 'v' characters as output. This is supposed to mean 'visited'? But I never visit those sites. Even a fake url shows up as 'v'. So I don't get this..

author: pdp
content: Visited sites will show up as pink Vs while not visted sites will show up as simle blue Vs. See the generated CSS for more information how it works.

author: pdp
content: and now you can download the code.
